subproblems.subproblem_question:
Below you can see on the left four binary numbers and on the right 4 interpretations of these numbers and a corresponding value. Match the number on the left to the descriptions on the right. (2 points)

Binary Number Value, Interpretation
1 11110 A Decimal -1, 5-bit two's complement
2 10001 B Decimal -1, 5 bit sign magnitude
3 10010 C Decimal 30, 5 bit unsigned
4 11111 D Hexadecimal 0x12, 5 bit unsigned
Consider the transistor level schematic below. What is the output going to be when A=1, B=0, C=1? (1 point)
Using only 2-input AND, 2-input OR, or inverters, draw a gate level schematic that realizes the same Boolean Function as the circuit shown in 1(b). (2 points)
